posts.postText: Maybe you just have a case of bad lag
No i Dont Some Guns Work like Shotgun,Auto Shotty,M4 (Sometimes) and whats funny on ttt i never lag when i pull a gun out
Used to happen to me. Try reinstalling and only re-install useful addons.
i Did Reinstall but All my stuff was the same,as in i had everything back.
rename the garrysmod/garrysmod folder to garrysmod/_garrysmod, then reinstall.

I've seen it happen to Vasto, and I watched him reinstall gmod. He told me yellow text appeared in the top right of his screen when he pulls out the weapon, so I suspect it's a lua error (if that helps anyone fix it).
